Obsoletions for 22.0

22.0

Type Name Description
Method GetM365CollaborationPlanId Replaced by GetMicrosoft365PlanId()
Codeunit System.Azure.Identity."Default Permission Set In Plan" Getting the default permissions will be done only inside the Azure AD Plan module.
Page System.Azure.Identity."Default Permission Set In Plan" The source table will be changed to Default Permission Set In Plan.
PermissionSet System.Azure.Identity."Azure AD Graph - Objects" This permission set is replaced with inherent permissions and is no longer needed.
PermissionSet System.Azure.Identity."Azure AD Tenant - Objects" This permission set is replaced with inherent permissions and is no longer needed.
PermissionSet System.Azure.KeyVault."Azure Key Vault - Objects" This permission set is replaced with inherent permissions and is no longer needed.
Method SetPageVariables No longer used.
PermissionSet System.Security.Authentication."OAuth - Objects" This permission set is replaced with inherent permissions and is no longer needed.
Method HasUserCustomPermissions Replaced with the ArePermissionsCustomized procedure in codeunit Azure AD User Management.
PermissionSet System.Security.User."User Login Times - Read" This permission set is replaced with inherent permissions and is no longer needed.
PermissionSet System.Security.User."User Login Times - View" This permission set is replaced with inherent permissions and is no longer needed.
PermissionSet System.Environment.Configuration."Navigation Bar Subs. - Objects" This permission set is replaced with inherent permissions and is no longer needed.
PermissionSet System.Environment.Configuration."Server Settings - Objects" This permission set is replaced with inherent permissions and is no longer needed.
PermissionSet System.Environment."Client Type Mgt. - Objects" This permission set is replaced with inherent permissions and is no longer needed.
PermissionSet System.Environment."Environment Info. - Objects" This permission set is replaced with inherent permissions and is no longer needed.
PermissionSet System.Text."Base64 Convert - Objects" This permission set is replaced with inherent permissions and is no longer needed.
PermissionSet System.Utilities."Confirm Management - Objects" This permission set is replaced with inherent permissions and is no longer needed.
PermissionSet System.Utilities."Regex - Objects" This permission set is replaced with inherent permissions and is no longer needed.
PermissionSet System.Utilities."URI - Objects" This permission set is replaced with inherent permissions and is no longer needed.
Method EditPageInExcel Filters are now provided through EditinExcelFilters
Method EditPageInExcel Filters are now provided through EditinExcelFilters
Method RemoveRelatedTable Replaced by RemoveTable below
Page System.Integration.Word."Word Templates Related List" No longer used. Use page 9987 Word Templates Related Part instead.
Method GetRecord Use Page.GetRecord instead.
PermissionSet System.IO."Data Compression - Objects" This permission set is replaced with inherent permissions and is no longer needed.
PermissionSet System.Reflection."Record Reference - Exec" This permission set is replaced with inherent permissions and is no longer needed.
